DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesize that differential dynamics in fat depots in response to two opposing dietary strategies mediate the beneficial metabolic effects during weight loss and regain phases.
DOC.criteria: Elevated waist circumference: Men: > 40 inches (102 cm) Women> 35 inches (88 cm) Poor dieters with TG>150mg/dL Pregnant or lactating women Serum creatinine LT 2 mg/dl Disturbed liver function (LT 3 fold level of ALT and AST enzymes) Active cancer Individuals who cannot start physical activity in the gym Individuals that are highly physically active (more than 4 hours/week) Active in other nutritional trial
